frontmatter.title: Spotting
frontmatter.description: Spot information for Exorde on the web and predict upcoming viral topics.

frontmatter.title: Moderating
frontmatter.description: Moderate spotted content by making sure it respects Exorde's Compliance Chart.

frontmatter.title: Formatting
frontmatter.description: Format moderated spots by isolating relevant and verifiable statements for Exorde within them.

frontmatter.title: Format-checking
frontmatter.description: Check if proposed formats correctly cut out so as to preserve Exorde's neutrality with regards to information.

frontmatter.title: Rooting
frontmatter.description: Find URLs on the web that replicate the information contained every statement formatted in the previous step.

frontmatter.title: Root-checking
frontmatter.description: Check that all the URLs proposed during the rooting step match all the statements they are linkedin to exactly.
